_RTENTRY Struct Reference

#include <net/route.h>

Collaboration diagram for _RTENTRY:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Route entry structure.


Data Fields

RTENTRY * rt_next
 Link to next entry.
u_long rt_ip
 Destination ip address.
u_long rt_mask
 IP address mask, -1 on host routes.
u_long rt_gateway
 Gateway ip address.
NUTDEVICE * rt_dev
 Device to use.
